title: What is the definition of listening skills? - Quora

response.answer_text: For this just imagine a situation, you were seated at Railway Station and you don't know on which platform your train will arrive. Displays were not working and only announcement will be the choice left for you. so in that situation your behavior is the right definition listening skills. Hope you like it.
Listening skills are defined as the skills of person's ability to perceive the information/ sentences spoken by others
